definition: Knowledge is not innate to man, how can we overcome doubt?/We are not born with knowledge, how does one achieve maturity? (i.e. without guidance from a teacher - Tang dynasty essayist Han Yu 韓愈|韩愈)
pinyin: ren2 fei1 sheng1 er2 zhi1 zhi1 zhe3 , shu2 neng2 wu2 huo4
simplified: 人非生而知之者，孰能无惑
word: 人非生而知之者，孰能無惑

definition: abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
